hero.title: Secure and intuitive file storage and sharing
hero.description: Protect, organize, and share your important documents with enterprise-grade security and a user-friendly interface that simplifies your digital life.

features.title: Features that transform your digital experience
features.description: Discover the powerful tools that make Orbyx Drive the ideal choice for everyday file management.

security.title: Advanced Security
security.description: End-to-end encryption for your most valuable files, with two-factor authentication for extra protection

organization.title: Intuitive Organization
organization.description: Organize your files in folders with custom colors and visual tags to find everything quickly

sharing.title: Smart Sharing
sharing.description: Share files securely using password-protected links and automatic expiration dates

anywhere.title: Access Anywhere
anywhere.description: Have your files always at hand on any device with our responsive interface and automatic synchronization

interface.title: Modern and functional interface
interface.description: A carefully designed user experience that combines aesthetics, functionality, and security in every detail.

customizable.title: Customizable View
customizable.description: Switch between list and grid views to adapt the interface to your way of working

previews.title: Integrated Previews
previews.description: View documents, images, and videos directly in the browser without the need for downloads

oneClick.title: Simplified Sharing
oneClick.description: Create secure links with one click and set custom access permissions

security.title: Security that doesn't complicate your life
security.description: We protect your data with cutting-edge technology while maintaining a simple and pleasant everyday experience.

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.description: Extra protection with the option to remember trusted devices for greater convenience

encryption.title: Advanced Encryption
encryption.description: Your files are protected with encryption throughout the entire process, from upload to storage

links.title: Links with Full Control
links.description: Define how long your shared links stay active and who can access them

testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.description: See what people are saying about their experience with Orbyx Drive

cta.title: Ready to protect what matters?
cta.description: Create your free account today and enjoy secure, organized, and accessible storage.

footer.tagline: The ultimate solution for storing and sharing your files with security, simplicity, and efficiency.
